items.name: Manuel Antonio Orchid & Heliconia Trail
items.short_description: Discover a vibrant array of native orchids, heliconias, and exotic flora along this lush, shaded pathway. Perfect for nature lovers and photographers seeking a splash of tropical color.

items.name: Quepos Farmers Market (Feria del Agricultor)
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in local culture at this bustling weekly market, offering fresh tropical fruits, artisanal crafts, and lively street food. A true taste of Quepos life!

items.name: Tulemar Resort Ocean View Infinity Pool
items.short_description: Experience unparalleled ocean views from this stunning infinity pool, blending seamlessly with the Pacific horizon. A luxurious spot for sunset cocktails and breathtaking photos.

items.name: Manuel Antonio Scenic Overlook
items.short_description: Capture panoramic vistas of Manuel Antonio National Park's pristine beaches and lush rainforest canopy from this elevated viewpoint. Keep an eye out for monkeys and sloths below!
items.location_hint: Main trail within Manuel Antonio National Park
